episode: I am hopeful that I can have an amazing relationship with my boyfriend

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My boyfriend and I are long distance. We have been together 3 years but I have a lot of hope we will be together for life

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really sweet. I'm sure it's tough being apart, but it's great that you're staying positive.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Absolutely. He has been with me through absolutely everything.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: He sounds like a keeper! You're lucky to have him.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: And he's lucky to have me too lol

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Mutual appreciation is the best!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He really does appreciate me. Even though I have no idea when I'll be ready to meet him, I am still full of hope

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's beautiful. Hope can get you through a lot.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It has. We have been through a lot, but mainly with each other and not AGAINST each other

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a great foundation for a relationship.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, I agree. I don't understand why so many couples wanna fight against each other

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's like, you're on the same team, right?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: exactly. and I know emotions can get in the way, but it doesn't have to be that way if you can put the ego aside

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Ego can be a major relationship killer.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is for most, not just romantic relationships but every other kind as well

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Ego can ruin friendships and family relationships too.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Exactly. I have had to put my ego aside a lot to work with him and be harmonious

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That takes a lot of maturity and love.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's what gives me hope, because he does the same for me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a beautiful mutual understanding.
